attributes.action: stop peanalising motorists and young drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
stop removing the pleasure of driving from drivers.

i want to see mobile camera vans and bikes banned, only place gatso cameras where there is actually a danger, dont even think about pay as you go to drive.

rules should stay the same for all drivers weather they are 17 or 70, and i think that if you get caught by a speed camera van you should have the choice of maybe a bigger fine instead of points or more points instead of a fine. its a human right to drive on the roads stop making it a nightmare!
